Bicycle: One option to travel long distances without a car is by bicycle. It is a healthy and way to travel and can be used to cover short to medium distances.
Train: Another option is to take a train. Trains can be used to travel long distances quickly and efficiently.
Bus: Buses are another option for long-distance travel. They are affordable and can be used to travel to different cities and towns.
Boat: If you live near a body of water, you can consider taking a boat to travel long distances. It can be a relaxing and scenic way to travel.
Hiking: If you have time and enjoy hiking, you can consider hiking to travel long distances. It can be a challenging but rewarding experience.
